Title: Establishes the New York water authority
Summary: Establishes the New York water authority for the purposes of purchasing, upgrading, and maintaining small private water companies; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 10-E §§1240 - 1240-y, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the New York water authority; and making an appropriation therefor
